languages.text: "С годами ты стал щедрее, Абеляр. В прежние времена ты бы пожалел расходовать патрон, сапогом бы забил из экономии".
"You've become more generous over the years, Abelard. In the old days, you wouldn't have wasted a bullet — you would have kicked me to death with your boot out of sheer frugality."
languages.original_text: "С годами ты стал щедрее, Абеляр. В прежние времена ты бы пожалел расходовать патрон, сапогом бы забил из экономии".

traits.locale_text: "You've become more generous over the years, Abelard. In the old days, you wouldn't waste a bullet and would just use your boot to beat me to death out of economy."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: "You've become more generous over the years, Abelard. In the old days, you wouldn't waste a bullet and would just use your boot to beat me to death out of economy."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: "You've become more generous over the years, Abelard. In the olden days, you wouldn't waste a bullet and would just use your boot to beat me to death to save up on the resources."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: "You've become more generous over the years, Abelard. In the olden days, you wouldn't waste a bullet and would just use your boot to beat me to death to save up on the resources."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: "You've become more generous over the years, Abelard. In the old days, you wouldn't have wasted a bullet — you would have kicked me to death with your boot out of sheer frugality."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: "You've become more generous over the years, Abelard. In the old days, you wouldn't have wasted a bullet — you would have kicked me to death with your boot out of sheer frugality."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: « Toutes ces années vous ont rendu plus généreux, Abélard. Autrefois, vous n'auriez pas gaspillé une balle, vous vous seriez contenté de m'achever à coups de pied pour économiser vos ressources. »
languages.original_text: "You've become more generous over the years, Abelard. In the old days, you wouldn't have wasted a bullet — you would have kicked me to death with your boot out of sheer frugality."

traits.locale_text: « Toutes ces années vous ont rendu plus généreux, Abélard. Autrefois, vous n'auriez pas gaspillé une balle, vous vous seriez contenté de m'achever à coups de pied pour économiser vos ressources. »
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: «Los años le han hecho más generoso, Abelard. En mi época, era tan agarrado con las balas que habría preferido darme una paliza con su bota con tal de ahorrar recursos».
languages.original_text: "You've become more generous over the years, Abelard. In the old days, you wouldn't have wasted a bullet — you would have kicked me to death with your boot out of sheer frugality."

traits.locale_text: «Los años le han hecho más generoso, Abelard. En mi época, era tan agarrado con las balas que prefería darme las palizas con su bota con tal de ahorrar recursos».
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: “过了这么多年，你变得比以前更慷慨了，阿贝拉德。换做以前，你根本不会在我身上浪费子弹。你只会用靴子把我活活踹死，为了节省资源。”
languages.original_text: "You've become more generous over the years, Abelard. In the old days, you wouldn't have wasted a bullet — you would have kicked me to death with your boot out of sheer frugality."

traits.locale_text: “过了这么多年，你变得比以前更慷慨了，阿贝拉德。换做以前，你根本不会在我身上浪费子弹。你只会用靴子把我活活踹死，节约资源。”
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: 「年を経て、ずいぶん寛大になったもんだね、アベラルド。昔は弾丸を無駄にすることなんてなかったのに。ブーツで私を殴り倒してでも、倹約に努めただろうにさ」
languages.original_text: "You've become more generous over the years, Abelard. In the old days, you wouldn't have wasted a bullet — you would have kicked me to death with your boot out of sheer frugality."

traits.locale_text: 「年を経て、ずいぶん寛大になったもんだね、アベラルド。昔は弾丸を無駄にすることなんてなかったのに。ブーツで私を殴り倒してでも、倹約に努めただろうにさ」
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: "Ihr seid im Laufe der Jahre großzügiger geworden, Abelard. Seinerzeit hättet Ihr keine Kugel für mich vergeudet ... Ihr hättet mich aus reiner Sparsamkeit mit Eurem Stiefel totgeprügelt."
languages.original_text: "You've become more generous over the years, Abelard. In the old days, you wouldn't have wasted a bullet — you would have kicked me to death with your boot out of sheer frugality."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid im Laufe der Jahre großzügiger geworden, Abelard. Früher hättet Ihr keine Kugel vergeudet, sondern mich einfach mit Euren Stiefeln totgeprügelt, um Ressourcen zu sparen."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: "Yıllar geçtikçe daha da cömertleşiyorsun Abelard. Eskiden olsa mermini bana harcamazdın, sırf cimriliğinden beni tekmeleyerek öldürürdün."
languages.original_text: "You've become more generous over the years, Abelard. In the old days, you wouldn't have wasted a bullet — you would have kicked me to death with your boot out of sheer frugality."
